summary: Project scope has expanded from the x39Matrix token-centric ICP portal to include a full rebrand/launch under x39matrix.com (triangle-with-eye as the official token logo everywhere), improved global domain/DNS/SSL reliability, public-facing airdrop/claim + wallet capture UX, and a planned NNS-style x39Matrix staking/governance “portfolio” experience with multilingual UI and companion Android/iOS app distribution plans.

existing_features.title: Cyberpunk landing page layout with responsive navigation
existing_features.description: Main App page renders a multi-section, scroll-to navigation experience with desktop and mobile menus, cyberpunk visuals, and section anchors (ICP, Dark Web, token sections, etc.).

existing_features.title: Tailwind + custom cyberpunk theme and animation system
existing_features.description: Global CSS defines neon text/glow effects, triangle pulse, glow pulse, mist float, and fade-in animations; Tailwind config extends fonts and OKLCH theme variables to support consistent styling.

existing_features.title: SEO and indexing configuration (meta tags, JSON-LD, sitemap, robots)
existing_features.description: index.html includes extensive SEO tags (Open Graph/Twitter, canonical, hreflang) and JSON-LD for WebSite/Article; public/robots.txt and public/sitemap.xml are configured for x39matrix.com.

existing_features.title: Intro splash screen with Matrix-style text rain
existing_features.description: IntroScreen shows a 2-second branded intro with canvas text rain and background image, then transitions to the main application.

existing_features.title: Three.js holographic background hero
existing_features.description: HolographicHero renders an animated Three.js scene (triangle + outline + particle field) as a subtle fixed background layer with resize handling and cleanup.

existing_features.title: Live ICP price widget (Binance polling)
existing_features.description: LiveICPPrice fetches ICPUSDT 24h ticker from Binance every 30s, displays price, 24h change, estimated market cap, and animated progress indicator.

existing_features.title: Interactive ICP charting with RSI and buy/sell signals
existing_features.description: GraficosSection fetches Binance klines (15m/1h/1d), computes RSI, generates buy/sell signals on threshold crosses, and renders simplified visual graphs and projections in a collapsible panel.

existing_features.title: Daily news updates feed (mock data) with auto refresh
existing_features.description: DailyNewsUpdates displays categorized ICP/Crypto/DeFi/Web3 news items (mocked) with relative timestamps and refreshes every 24 hours.

existing_features.title: Token info/registration presentation section
existing_features.description: X39TokenRegistrationSection presents token metadata (name/symbol/supply/decimals) and ecosystem contribution messaging, including an airdrop counter (mock).

existing_features.title: Promotional airdrop claim UX (frontend-only)
existing_features.description: X39TokenPromotionalAirdropSection displays campaign details, a claimed counter (mock), and a claim button that triggers wallet registration; shows a success state after simulated completion.

existing_features.title: Wallet registration modal with validation and simulated submission
existing_features.description: WalletRegistrationModal collects wallet type and address, performs basic client-side validation, shows error/success UI, and simulates async registration before calling onSuccess.

existing_features.title: Android app promotion and APK download links
existing_features.description: AndroidMobileAppSection and AndroidDownloadButton provide direct APK download links and marketing copy; AndroidDownloadModal provides PWA-style installation instructions content (where used).

existing_features.title: Element (Matrix) community chat deep link
existing_features.description: ElementChatSection opens a matrix.to room link in a new tab with cyberpunk-styled call-to-action.

existing_features.title: Premium ICP content sections (static full content)
existing_features.description: PremiumICPSections renders two long-form premium-style content sections with animated triangle imagery and strong branded messaging (content is not actually gated in the provided implementation).

existing_features.title: Davos outcomes report article section
existing_features.description: DavosOutcomesReportSection provides a styled, long-form informational article layout with cyberpunk decorative assets and content blocks.

existing_features.title: Información Variada section with timed video overlay
existing_features.description: InformacionVariadaSection includes a button that plays ChopinVideoPlayer as a full-screen background overlay for 45 seconds and provides additional resource links (APIs/CLI references).

existing_features.title: Reddit promo message section
existing_features.description: RedditPromoSection shows a preformatted promotional post (hashtags/links) styled with Matrix-like mono typography and neon accents.

existing_features.title: Performance metrics dashboard (mock, auto-updating)
existing_features.description: PerformanceMetricsDashboard generates platform metrics (traffic, engagement, CTR, reach) with progress bars and refreshes automatically every 30 seconds (mocked data).

existing_features.title: Token analytics panel (mock)
existing_features.description: TokenAnalyticsPanel displays mocked trading volume/TVL/inflow/outflow metrics using a cyberpunk panel layout.

existing_features.title: QR code display widget with CDN fallback and minimize/expand
existing_features.description: QRCodeSection loads qrcodejs from multiple CDNs with retries/backoff, renders a QR code for a given URL, and supports a minimized floating UI state.

existing_features.title: Camera access and QR scanning hook (jsQR)
existing_features.description: useCamera manages getUserMedia lifecycle, switching cameras, and photo capture; useQRScanner loads jsQR and scans frames at an interval, storing recent decoded results.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication context provider
existing_features.description: InternetIdentityProvider wraps the app and exposes identity state plus login/logout actions, with persisted identity loading and status flags for UI.

existing_features.title: Backend actor creation hook with identity support (React Query)
existing_features.description: useActor creates an anonymous or authenticated actor via createActorWithConfig, calls initializeAccessControl, and invalidates/refetches non-actor queries when identity changes.

existing_features.title: Access control system (roles: admin/user/guest) in backend
existing_features.description: Motoko access-control module assigns the first registered principal as admin and subsequent principals as users; provides permission checks and admin-only role assignment.

existing_features.title: User profile storage and retrieval in backend
existing_features.description: Backend supports saving and querying UserProfile records keyed by Principal; access is restricted to the caller or admin.

existing_features.title: Admin-managed product CRUD in backend
existing_features.description: Backend exposes get/add/update/delete product endpoints; add/update/delete are restricted to admin role via access control.

existing_features.title: Stripe Checkout session creation and status lookup
existing_features.description: Backend stripe module creates Stripe Checkout sessions via HTTP outcalls and allows querying session status, including extraction of client_reference_id.

existing_features.title: HTTP outcall helper with response transform
existing_features.description: Backend outcall module wraps IC management canister http_request for GET/POST, attaches headers, assigns cycles, and uses a transform function to sanitize response headers.

existing_features.title: Blob storage operations mixin (Caffeine storage gateway integration)
existing_features.description: Storage mixin supports updating authorized gateway principals from a cashier canister, listing/pruning dead blobs, triggering GC, and topping up cashier cycles with reserved balance handling.

existing_features.title: 3D mini-game: “ICP vs Criptos” (React Three Fiber)
existing_features.description: Full-screen modal 3D game where a rotating ICP torus player moves with WASD/arrows, enemies (BTC/SOL/ETH) spawn and chase the player, collectibles grant points and extra lives, and victory is achieved by eating 20 enemies; includes HUD and overlays (start/game over/victory).

existing_features.title: 2D mini-game: Comecoco (Pac-Man style) on Canvas
existing_features.description: Comecoco implements a maze, dot collection, ghost chase AI, score and lives tracking, and win/game-over overlays with Spanish UI.

existing_features.title: ICP payment gate UI (copy-to-clipboard wallet address)
existing_features.description: ICPPaymentGate renders an ICP-only payment instruction panel with a hard-coded wallet address and copy-to-clipboard support, intended to gate premium content.

existing_features.title: ICP external utility buttons (staking + wallet dashboard)
existing_features.description: ICPStakingButton opens the NNS app for staking; ICPWalletButton opens the Internet Computer dashboard account page for a specified wallet address.

existing_features.title: Inline source code display with copy
existing_features.description: SourceCodeDisplay renders provided file contents with file headers and a one-click copy button that concatenates all file contents to clipboard.

existing_features.title: URL parameter utilities with session persistence and secret-hash handling
existing_features.description: urlParams utilities support reading query/hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, extracting secrets from hash fragments, and clearing them from the URL to reduce leakage.

existing_features.title: React Query hook to fetch current user profile via actor
existing_features.description: useGetCallerUserProfile uses the ICP actor to call getCallerUserProfile with proper enabled gating on actor readiness and a combined loading state.

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library scaffold (frontend build-template)
existing_features.description: Project now includes a shadcn/ui-style component set (accordion, dialog, dropdown-menu, form, sidebar, etc.) and supporting frontend build-template configuration for consistent UI primitives.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template for ICP app (Dockerfile, scripts, canister yamls)
existing_features.description: Added/updated a build-template with Dockerfile, deploy.sh, workspace/package configs, canister.yaml files for frontend/backend, and utility scripts (e.g., prune/resize images) to standardize builds and deployments.

existing_features.title: Custom frontend ESLint rules for ICP/React patterns
existing_features.description: Introduced custom ESLint rules (e.g., require-internet-identity-provider, no-bigint-in-query-keys) and updated ESLint configuration to enforce project-specific best practices.

existing_features.title: NNS-inspired Hold/Stake module (time-locked holdings)
existing_features.description: Frontend provides an authenticated Hold/Stake experience for creating and managing time-locked holding entries (amount, lock duration, start/end), with dedicated UI (CreateHoldingForm, HoldingsList, StakeHoldModule) and react-query hooks (useHoldings) for persistence/refresh.

existing_features.title: NNS-inspired governance module (proposal list/detail)
existing_features.description: Frontend adds an NNS-like governance surface (GovernanceModule) with proposal browsing and details (ProposalList/ProposalDetail) backed by react-query hooks (useProposals), integrated into the authenticated app experience.

existing_features.title: Token portfolio shell and navigation for NNS-like modules
existing_features.description: Introduced a dedicated portfolio shell layout and navigation components to host the new hold/stake and governance modules in a cohesive NNS-like UI flow.

existing_features.title: Connectivity diagnostics UI for ICP/network troubleshooting
existing_features.description: Frontend includes a connectivity diagnostics component and hook to help users troubleshoot common ICP access/network issues (e.g., reachability checks and guidance), integrated into the SPA UI.

Prepare an iOS release submission build for the Apple App Store, including producing a release archive suitable for App Store Connect submission and providing step-by-step signing/provisioning instructions required for a developer to export an IPA (English).

new_feature_requests.summary: Rebrand site to x39matrix.com (update branding/title/canonicals) and set up domain mapping + HTTPS; optional 301 redirect from x39dark.com
Create Android mobile app focused only on x39Matrix token + airdrop + wallet-buy info (separate from web)
Add user registration (name-only) to claim free x39Matrix tokens (airdrop) and store per-user state (claimed status, wallet address)
Add buy flow for x39Matrix at real market price sourced from MEXC (display price + allow user to proceed with purchase via supported wallets/links)
Add wallet selector/connector UX for claim/buy/exchange actions (ICP wallets and other supported wallets), including manual address entry and validation

Implement a real per-user registration + free-claim (airdrop) flow for the X39 Matrix token using Internet Identity authentication, persisting the user’s claim status and registered wallet details in the backend (one claim per authenticated principal).

Add X39 Matrix live market-price display sourced from MEXC (real-time public market data), with a frontend direct-fetch attempt and a backend HTTP-outcall proxy fallback for reliability/CORS (mirroring the existing ICP/Binance proxy pattern).

Create a “Buy X39 Matrix” flow that uses the MEXC-derived market price display and provides a clear path to purchase via supported external links and/or wallet instructions, while also recording the user’s intent/action in their account for later reference (without claiming on-chain execution).

Add a wallet exchange/transfer helper UI that lets users store and manage their wallet addresses in their user account and provides clear external actions to move/exchange holdings using their wallet(s), without implementing direct wallet connectivity or on-chain transfers inside the app.

Ensure all newly added user-facing UI text for the new registration/buy/stake/exchange flows is in English and integrated into the existing translation approach (without editing immutable frontend hook files).
Add name-only user registration with unique display names plus a community comments area (welcome message + ability to comment on the project)
Implement a public airdrop claim mechanic tied to registration (e.g., up to 20 tokens per registered user) with wallet selection + manual address entry during claim
Standardize x39Matrix token branding assets: reuse the original triangle-with-eye logo as the official x39Matrix token logo across header, favicon, and all token references
Build an NNS-style x39Matrix staking + governance portfolio experience (Internet Identity login, staking/lockups, governance proposals/voting) matching NNS blue portfolio UI
Add multilingual UI selector and translations (at least ES/EN/JP/ZH/KR; optionally DE) for the new x39Matrix portal/modules
Create companion native mobile apps for x39Matrix (Android + iOS) aligned with the web UX, with download distribution plan (Play Store/App Store builds and/or APK)
Add/adjust live market panels: ICP official logo + price/market metrics sourced from Binance with regular refresh (e.g., every 30s) and consistent header layout

architecturalNotes: Frontend is a React SPA (TypeScript) styled with Tailwind CSS + custom cyberpunk animation utilities (neon glow, triangle pulse, mist float) and uses lucide-react icons extensively.
Uses @tanstack/react-query for data fetching/caching; actor creation is identity-aware and triggers dependent query invalidation/refetch on identity changes.
Authentication uses DFINITY Internet Identity via @dfinity/auth-client, exposed through a React context provider (login/logout, persisted identity, 30-day TTL).

ICP canister interaction follows the actor pattern: an anonymous actor is used when unauthenticated; an authenticated actor is created with identity and runs an initialization step (initializeAccessControl).
3D rendering is used in multiple places: a Three.js canvas background (HolographicHero) and a React Three Fiber mini-game (X39ICPGame).
QR utilities rely on dynamically loaded external CDN scripts (qrcodejs for generation and jsQR for scanning) with retry/fallback logic.

Backend is a single Motoko actor composed from modules: authorization/access-control, stripe integration, HTTP outcall helper, and blob-storage mixin; authorization is role-based (#admin/#user/#guest).
Backend HTTP calls to Stripe use IC management canister http_request with a transform function to strip headers, and attach cycles explicitly per request.
A shadcn/ui-style component library scaffold has been added (via build-template), providing reusable UI primitives and associated frontend tooling/configuration.

Repository now includes a build-template for standardized ICP deployments (Dockerfile, deploy.sh, canister.yaml files, workspace/package setup) and build utility scripts (prune-unused-images, resize-images).
Frontend linting now includes custom ESLint rules specific to project patterns (e.g., enforcing InternetIdentityProvider usage and avoiding BigInt in React Query keys).
Project undergoing domain/brand migration from x39dark.com to x39matrix.com; requires ICP canister custom-domain mapping and DNS/SSL setup for global availability.
x39Matrix token marketing UI uses a single official triangular ‘eye’ logo as the token mark across all placements (header/token blocks/favicon).
Airdrop claim UX includes wallet selection and manual wallet address entry by the user; avoid displaying any private/team allocation details publicly.
Backend modules and build-template dependencies were updated to newer component versions (authorization v3.0.0, stripe v3.0.0, http-outcalls v3.0.0, blob-storage v4.0.0, core-infrastructure v1.0.2).

Product direction now includes token utility surfaces beyond marketing: registration/airdrop claims, wallet linking, exchange price integration (MEXC), and an NNS-like staking/governance module for x39Matrix.
Frontend now includes an NNS-like module area with portfolio shell/navigation plus separate stake/holdings and governance feature modules.
Holdings and governance data access are implemented via dedicated React Query hooks (useHoldings/useProposals) to integrate with the existing identity-aware actor/query invalidation patterns.
Authentication UX is extended with a dedicated login button component (components/auth/X39LoginButton) for gating the new modules behind Internet Identity.
Added a frontend connectivity diagnostics hook/component to surface network/ICP access troubleshooting guidance to users.
Planned expansion: deliver an NNS-style x39Matrix staking/governance portfolio UX gated by Internet Identity, targeting web plus native Android/iOS app packaging.
Planned UX: claim/airdrop flow should prompt wallet type selection and manual wallet address entry before completing registration/claim.
Branding requirement: triangle-with-eye artwork used previously ("Oráculo de Davos") is the canonical x39Matrix token logo and must be reused consistently (header/favicon/token blocks).
knownIssues: ICPPaymentGate describes automatic unlocking after payment, but no payment verification/unlock mechanism is implemented in the frontend (and no matching backend logic is present in the provided code).
Several UI panels use mock/generated data (TokenAnalyticsPanel, PerformanceMetricsDashboard, DailyNewsUpdates, token counters), indicating missing real backend integrations.
Hard-coded reliance on Binance public APIs may fail in some environments due to rate limits, regional blocks, or CORS/network restrictions.
AccessControl assigns the first non-anonymous principal calling initializeAccessControl() as admin; there is no recovery/rotation mechanism if that principal is lost or never initializes.
Blob storage module requires the CAFFFEINE_STORAGE_CASHIER_PRINCIPAL environment variable; canister traps if missing.

Custom domain (x39matrix.com / x39.org) intermittently fails to resolve to the ICP canister and may show a default Nginx page, indicating DNS/SSL/canister domain-mapping misconfiguration or incomplete propagation.
Countdown/launch-timer logic has been unstable and was requested to be removed or replaced to avoid credibility issues.
x39matrix.com domain access reported as failing/not opening; indicates ongoing DNS/SSL/custom-domain-to-canister mapping issues similar to prior x39dark.com problems.
Users report x39matrix.com / x39Matrix.com not opening in browsers; indicates ongoing DNS/SSL/custom-domain-to-canister mapping problems beyond existing intermittent resolution issues.
Frequent deploy/publish failures and draft expirations interrupt continuity; deployment process appears unreliable and may block changes from reaching production.
